content: Yes, that's absolutely true. It's important to recognize that what works for one person may not work for someone else, and everyone has the right to define and pursue their own version of a fulfilling relationship. While monogamy may be the most common model of relationships in some cultures, it's not necessarily the only one, and people should feel free to explore different options that feel right for them. The key is to communicate openly and honestly with one's partner(s) to ensure that everyone is on the same page and respects each other's boundaries and preferences.
